improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero.  Add a check to ensure y != 0 before the division on line 16.
Unnecessary branch. The value of y is always 4 after the loop.
The variable y is assigned in both if and else blocks. This can be simplified.
The value of y is always 4 after the for loop. This means the division by y will always work, however, this could have been a logical error and must be reviewed.
